function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Provision of protective equipment and engagement with local unions and professional associations","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Engagement with religious leaders to create safe alternatives over radio or social media","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of local strategies and guidance for home isolation or group isolation, reducing contact in highly congested areas, and development of simple signage systems for self-isolating homes","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of restrictions with local participation, allowance for local adaptation, and support to vulnerable people","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptation of community organization processes to adhere to physical distancing guidelines and minimize in-person contact with high-risk groups.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establishment of credible communication channels to manage misinformation and rumors, and promotion of accurate public health information.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of individual and household-level isolation and quarantine measures instead of settlement-wide quarantines.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Education and awareness campaigns, community support and empowerment, destigmatization efforts.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advocacy for the inclusion of bottom-up approaches, capacity building for local organizations, collaboration with local authorities.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide access to healthcare, safety nets, and reliable information; address social and economic inequalities","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement alternative meal programs, support households, address teenage pregnancy, and protect isolated elderly residents","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improved access to protective equipment, support for self-isolation, and increased awareness of virus transmission risks.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Establishment of community support networks, improved access to health services, and provision of targeted information campaigns.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promotion of gender equality initiatives, provision of support for female health workers, and implementation of gender-sensitive response strategies.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Community policing initiatives, conflict mediation programs, and economic empowerment activities.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Psychosocial support services, mental health intervention programs, and resilience-building initiatives.","category":"Psychosocial support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Legal protections for tenants, affordable housing initiatives, and community eviction prevention programs.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide support to address ongoing travel needs and livelihood concerns, and provide careful management of travel restrictions","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement measures to ensure food distribution, support informal markets, and provide food assistance to vulnerable populations","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Address overlapping issues through a multidimensional approach, provide support for health, social, and infrastructural needs, and enhance community resilience","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of emergency approaches, government compensation, strengthening social protection systems, and redeployment to response efforts.","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public health education, community outreach, and improved access to healthcare facilities","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Quality improvement initiatives, patient feedback systems, and cultural competence training","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improving indoor and outdoor air quality, regulating waste burning and cooking practices","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement robust data encryption and privacy protection measures, and regularly audit data security protocols.","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementation of robust data security measures, user consent for data collection, and adherence to data protection regulations.","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement strict data protection measures, educate the public on data usage, and enforce strict access controls","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular security audits, access control policies, and user consent for data collection","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Strict data access controls, encryption of sensitive data, and staff training on data handling","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improved detection methods and robust standard protocols for clean-up and measurements","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enhance wastewater treatment processes to ensure complete reduction of viral load","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Careful monitoring of pH, salt concentration, and contamination with extraneous nucleic acids during PCR process","category":"Managing drinking water safety measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Validation of PCR results through additional testing or comparison with alternative detection methods.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Validation of assay results using alternative cell lines or culture methods, and cross-validation with confirmation.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improved wastewater treatment processes to effectively eliminate or reduce gene material in the effluent.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enhanced treatment methods to effectively eliminate infectious viral RNA.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementation of advanced wastewater treatment technologies to eliminate the virus-specific RNA","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Studies on virus distribution and survival in aquatic environments, development of water treatment methods to inactivate the virus","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Accurately identify changes in residents’ demands and explore campaigns","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conduct comprehensive impact assessments and adjust resource allocation strategies
